      • getLyricsFromDB

        public static int getLyricsFromDB​(java.lang.String requestCountry,
                                  java.lang.String requestGenre)
        Method to call Stored procedure. Stored procedure checks how much time passed from the last request with same parameters and if needed, returns data from the database.
